    FullOpeningTag(

            span: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 1,
                position: 0,

        },
    ),

        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: MagicConstant(
                CompilerHaltOffset(
                    Span {
                        line: 3,
                        column: 1,
                        position: 7,
                    },
                ),
            ),
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 25,
                    position: 31,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
